AAB.CO.summary: Aalborg Boldspilklub A/S operates a professional football stadium in Denmark. The company offers tickets to football games and merchandise to private individuals and corporate customers. Aalborg Boldspilklub A/S was founded in 1885 and is based in Aalborg, Denmark.

AGF-B.CO.summary: AGF A/S operates sports and event activities in Denmark. It operates through two segments, Football and Facilities. The Football segment offers football matches shown on TV, sponsorships, transfers of football players, football matches, and physiotherapy. The Facilities segment rents properties and premises, sales in connection with events, conferences, and concerts. It also operates restaurants that provide catering for events. The company was formerly known as Aarhus Elite A/S and changed its name to AGF A/S in December 2017. AGF A/S was founded in 1880 and is based in Aarhus, Denmark.

ASGRF.summary: Astralis Group A/S operates as an esports company. It owns three esports teams under the Astralis, Origen, and Future FC brands. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

ASTGRP.CO.summary: Astralis Group A/S operates as an esports company. It owns three esports teams under the Astralis, Origen, and Future FC brands. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

PARKEN.CO.summary: PARKEN Sport & Entertainment A/S operates in the sports industry in Denmark. The company operates a football stadium and club, and office properties. It is also involved in the operation of Lalandia holiday and activity centers; and the rental and sale of holiday homes. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

SIF.CO.summary: Silkeborg IF Invest A/S operates a professional football club in Denmark. It also engages in the rental and operation of business area; and hotel and conference activities. The company was formerly known as SIF Football Support A/S and changed its name to Silkeborg IF Invest A/S in 2008. Silkeborg IF Invest A/S was founded in 1917 and is based in Silkeborg, Denmark.

TIV.CO.summary: Tivoli A/S engages in entertainment and recreational activities. The company operates and maintains gardens. The company offers rides, games, shows, events, and concerts. It also operates restaurants, as well as online casino through Danske Spi. Tivoli A/S was founded in 1843 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
